executable.parameters:
WSI Analysis Whole-slide image analysis (WSI) parameters
wsi_downsample Analysis tile downsample The downsample rate at which the analysis should be performed w.r.t. full resolution wsi_downsample 2
patch_size Analysis tile size Tile size for blockwise analysis (pixels) patch_size 2000 7208ec76252542ba8286441ba3ca05f5
tile_stride Tile stride The stride used for overlapping patches during analysis (pixels) tile_stride 1000
remove_border Remove patch border The size (pixels) of the patch border which is discarded prior to stitching - removes edge artifacts (this requires sufficient patch overlap) remove_border 100
batch_size Analysis batch size The batch size for processing WSI patches batch_size 1
min_size Minimum object size The minimum size in pixels of objects detected by the analysis - a value of 0 does not remove small objects min_size 2000
simplify_contours Annotation contour approximation epsilon The amount of approximation used to simplify the predicted boundaries - we don't recommend setting this above a value of 0.01 (uses the Douglas-Peucker Algorythm) simplify_contours 0.005
gpu GPU The ID of the GPU to use for analysis gpu 0
